sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1949年 京都府立農林専門学校 (旧制)・京都府立女子専門学校 (旧制)を母体として新制大学西京大学発足、文家政学部・農学部設置
sen.e: In 1949 a new system Saikyo University was inaugurated with Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science and Faculty of Agriculture, based on Kyoto Prefectural Vocational TrainingSschool of Agriculture and Forestry (old system) and Kyoto Prefectural Girls' Vocational Training School (old system) as parent organizations.

In 1949 a new system Saikyo University was inaugurated with Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science and Faculty of Agriculture, based on Kyoto Prefectural Vocational Training School of Agriculture and Forestry (old system) and Kyoto Prefectural Girls' Vocational Training School (old system) as parent organizations.

1949: a new system Saikyo University was inaugurated with Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science and Faculty of Agriculture, based on Kyoto Prefectural Vocational Training School of Agriculture and Forestry (old system) and Kyoto Prefectural Girls' Vocational Training School (old system) as parent organizations.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 1951年 女子短期大学部を設置
sen.e: In 1951 Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College was established.
In 1951 Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College was established.
1951: Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College was established.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 1959年 京都府立大学に改称
sen.e: In 1959 it changed to Kyoto Prefectural University.
In 1959 it changed to Kyoto Prefectural University.
1959: it changed to Kyoto Prefectural University.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 1970年 文家政学部を文学部と家政学部に分離
sen.e: In 1970 Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science was divided into Faculty of Letters and Faculty of Home Economics.
In 1970 Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science was divided into Faculty of Letters and Faculty of Home Economics.
1970: Faculty of Letters and Domestic Science was divided into Faculty of Letters and Faculty of Home Economics.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 1977年 家政学部を生活科学部に改称
sen.e: In 1977 Faculty of Home Economics changed to Faculty of Human Live and Science.
In 1977 Faculty of Home Economics changed to Faculty of Human Life and Science.
1977: Faculty of Home Economics changed to Faculty of Human Life and Science.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 1995年 福祉社会学部、人間環境学部を設置し、女子短期大学部の学生募集を停止
sen.e: In 1995 Faculty of Welfare Society and Faculty of Human and Environment were established and the students' application for Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College was suspended.
In 1995 Faculty of Welfare Society and Faculty of Human and Environment were established and the student applications for Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College were suspended.
1995: Faculty of Welfare Society and Faculty of Human and Environment were established and the student applications for Kyoto Prefectural University Women's College were suspended.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.e: In 2004 Faculty of Human Live and Science was abolished.
In 2004 Faculty of Human Life and Science was abolished.
2004: Faculty of Human Life and Science was abolished.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 2008年 公立大学法人制度を導入、京都府公立大学法人が京都府立医科大学と京都府立大学の2大学を運営。
sen.e: In 2008 the public university corporate body system was introduced and the Kyoto Prefectural University corporate body began to manage both Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and Kyoto Prefectural University.
sen.cmt: 「公立大学法人制度」をpublic university corporate body systemとしました。
sen.e: In 2008 the public university corporate body system was introduced and the Kyoto Prefectural University corporate body began to manage both Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and Kyoto Prefectural University.

2008: the public university corporate body system was introduced and the Kyoto Prefectural University corporate body began to manage both Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and Kyoto Prefectural University.
sen.cmt: 表記を年月日： に変更

sen.j: 公共政策学部、生命環境学部を設置し、福祉社会学部、人間環境学部、農学部の募集を停止。
sen.e: Faculty of Public Policy and Faculty of Life and Environmental Sciences were established and the students' application for Faculty of Welfare Society, Faculty of Human and Environment and Faculty of Agriculture was suspended.

Faculty of Public Policy and Faculty of Life and Environmental Sciences were established and the student applications for Faculty of Welfare Society, Faculty of Human and Environment and Faculty of Agriculture were suspended.

Sports
Sports
Sports

sen.j: 六公立大学総合競技大会が毎年秋に行われる。
sen.e: Kansai Big Six Public Universities Games was held every autumn.
Kansai Big Six Public Universities Games was held every autumn.
Kansai Big Six Public Universities Games is held every autumn.
sen.cmt: 今も行われていると解釈し、現在形にしました。

sen.j: 京都方：京都府大、大阪方：大阪府立大学（旧大阪府大・旧大阪女子大）、兵庫方：兵庫県立大学（旧神戸商大・旧姫路工大・旧姫路短大）の3チームに分かれて戦う。
sen.e: Three teams fight each other, such as Kyoto side : Kyoto Prefectural University, Osaka side : Prefecture University (old Osaka Prefecture University and old Osaka Women's University), and Hyogo side : University of Hyogo (old Kobe University of Commerce and old Himeji Institute of Technology and old Himeji College of Hyogo).

Three teams fight each other, such as Kyoto side : Kyoto Prefectural University, Osaka side : Prefecture University (old Osaka Prefecture University and old Osaka Women's University), and Hyogo side : University of Hyogo (old Kobe University of Commerce and old Himeji Institute of Technology and old Himeji College of Hyogo).

Three teams fight each other, such as Kyoto side: Kyoto Prefectural University, Osaka side: Prefecture University (old Osaka Prefecture University and old Osaka Women's University), and Hyogo side: University of Hyogo (old Kobe University of Commerce and old Himeji Institute of Technology and old Himeji College of Hyogo).
sen.cmt: コロンの前のスペース削除。

sen.j: 滋賀県立大学との京滋総合競技大会が毎年夏に行われる。
sen.e: Kyoto and Shiga Public Universities Games, where Kyoto Prefectural University competes with The University of Shiga Prefecture, was held every summer.
Kyoto and Shiga Public Universities Games, where Kyoto Prefectural University competes with The University of Shiga Prefecture, were held every summer.
